error.md5NotSupported: MD5 is not supported by Web Crypto API. Please use another algorithm.
error.jwtNotYetValid: JWT token is not yet valid
error.passwordHashRequiresExternal: Password hash algorithm {algorithm} requires an external library. Please use a dedicated password hashing library (e.g. npm:bcrypt or npm:argon2).
error.passwordVerifyRequiresExternal: Password verification requires an external library. Please use a dedicated password hashing library (e.g. npm:bcrypt or npm:argon2).
